title: The Time that’s Flowing Quietly
detail_text: <:th_ch0203/>Fuu…. That was a really lovely story, Hanamaru-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>I know right? It’s a book Maru has confidence in recommending zura!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>The book was wonderful, but UraGirls’ library is really amazing too! It really calms you down. To be able to read in a place like this, it makes me jealous. The scenery outside of the window as you take your eyes off of the book is also, tasteful….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Ehehe~. If you say it like that it makes me happy zura♪ But, speaking of which, NijiGaku’s library is also amazing! To be surrounded by lots of books everyday….It’s like a dream zura~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Fufu. Then, let’s go find a book together at our library next time<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Really!? I’m so happy zura! It’s a promise okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
